text: Sri Lanka competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Swimming== Sri Lanka qualified four swimmers. One swimmer did not participated. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font- size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Dimuth Peiris |align=left|50 m backstroke |27.18 |55 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m backstroke |59.62 |54 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ;Women {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Aniqah Gaffoor |align=left|50 m butterfly |30.36 |49 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m butterfly |1:12.63 |49 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=2|Kimiko Raheem |align=left|50 m freestyle |27.56 |57 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m backstroke |1:06.52 |50 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships Category:2019 in Sri Lankan sport Category:Sri Lanka at the World Aquatics Championships
title: Sri Lanka at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships
